<<<<<<< HEAD
Reformation's remora; or, Temporizing the stop of building the temple. A sermon preached before the Right Honourable the House of Peers, in the Abbey-Church at Westminster, upon the 25th of February, 1645. being the day appointed for their solemne and publike humiliation. / By William Jenkyn, Master of Arts, and minister of Gods Word at Christ-Church London. Jenkyn, William, 1613-1685.
[8], 36 p.
Printed by G.M. for Christopher Meredith, at the signe of the Crane in Pauls Church-yard., London, : 1646.
With a preliminary order to print. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

Printed by G.M. for Christopher Meredith, at the signe of the Crane in Pauls Church-yard., London, : 1646.
